messages.title: THE LATEST SCOTTISH OPINION POLLS ARE CLEAR
messages.content: Labour and the Lib Dems are now too weak to stand up to the SNP

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour and the Lib Dems are now too weak to stand up to the SNP

leaflet.personalStatement: You have my guarantee that the Scottish Conservatives will oppose the SNP every step of the way.

quotes.text: You have my guarantee that the Scottish Conservatives will oppose the SNP every step of the way.

images.caption: THE LATEST SCOTTISH OPINION POLLS ARE CLEAR
